channel.title: Podcast on Vincent Behar
channel.description: Recent content in Podcast on Vincent Behar

item.title: Examining OpenTelemetry with Vincent Behar of Ubisoft
item.description:
I was interviewed by Charity Majors and Liz Fong-Jones from the Observability Podcast (o11ycast).

We talked about OpenTelemetry, Continuous Delivery, and how we’ve joined the 2 together in Jenkins X.

item.title: How we are using and contributing to Jenkins X at Dailymotion
item.description:
I was interviewed by Jacqueline Salinas from the Continuous Delivery Foundation podcast: The Pipeline: All Things CD & DevOps.

We talked about how we are using and contributing to Jenkins X at Dailymotion:

  • our story with Jenkins X
  • our contributions - the web UI & the observability stack - and why we contribute

Fresh content available! Check out the latest ep. of The Pipeline: All Things CD & DevOps podcast. This week our guest @vbehar joins to talk about distributed tracing for CD pipelines with @jenkinsxio & @Dailymotion. https://t.co/KvLsf1W0Os pic.twitter.com/U76TP1IEaD

item.title: Interview on the DevOps Radio Podcast
item.description:
At the DevOps World | Jenkins World 2019 Conference in Lisbon, I was interviewed by Brian Dawson from the DevOps Radio podcast.

We talked about:

  • me
  • Dailymotion
  • Dailymotion’s ad-tech platform
  • Continuous Delivery
  • Jenkins X
